conclusion: Objects A and B are sheets placed above objects C, D, E, and F.
Objects C, D, E, and F are cubes located on a table.
When objects A and B move through the air and are placed down at the location of objects C, D, E, F, they come into contact with these cubes due to gravity.
The sheets (objects A and B) will cover the cubes (objects C, D, E, F) completely.
The answer: they will be covered by the sheets.
